citations.narrative:
The covering for the roof insulation over enclosures 13/14 in KA 5 building is torn. Loose insulation is hanging over an
enclosure housing non human primates . The insulation could easily fall into the animal enclosure and poses a risk of
injury if ingested or contacted by the animals.
Housing facilities for nonhuman primates must be designed and constructed so that they are structurally sound for the
species of nonhuman primates housed in them. They must be kept in good repair, and they must protect the animals from
injury, contain the animals securely, and restrict other animals from entering. This area must be repaired or replaced an
insulation over all enclosures properly maintained.
A maintenance crew was arriving at the building to repair the insulation covering as the inspector was leaving the area.
Corrected On : 3/22/2023
This inspection and exit briefing were conducted with facility employees.
End Section

narrative:
3.75(a) 
   
Housing facilities, general. 
The covering for the roof insulation over enclosures 13/14 in KA 5 building  is torn. Loose insulation is hanging over an 
enclosure housing non human primates . The insulation could easily fall into the animal enclosure and poses a risk of 
injury if ingested or contacted by the animals. 
Housing facilities for nonhuman primates must be designed and constructed so that they are structurally sound for the 
species of nonhuman primates housed in them. They must be kept in good repair, and they must protect the animals from 
injury, contain the animals securely, and restrict other animals from entering. This area must be repaired or replaced an 
insulation over all enclosures properly maintained. 
A maintenance crew was arriving at the building to repair the insulation covering as the inspector was leaving the area. 
Corrected On : 3/22/2023 
 
This inspection and exit briefing were conducted with facility employees. 
 
End Section
